TransactionStateContext.StakingState: When users deposit funds through the Put function, it records their balances and unlock times.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: When users collect funds through the Collect function, it validates conditions like the minimum balance, unlock time, and transfers the funds if conditions are met.

ExternalInteractions.ExternalInteractions: The contract interacts with the user wallet for both deposits and withdrawals. It also interacts with the Log contract to record messages for each transaction.
